projects.name: Outbreak-PTO
projects.shortDescription: A top-down action shooter game built with the Unity Engine.
projects.longDescription: A top-down action shooter game built in the Unity Engine with pixel-art graphics. Gameplay inspired by the roguelike genre.

projects.name: Console Menu
projects.shortDescription: A console-based C++ GUI for Windows.
projects.longDescription: A C++ GUI for the standard Windows C++ output console. Allows for the devlopment of reactive user interfaces within the console.

projects.name: CARLA Platoon System
projects.shortDescription: An automated platooning system in the CARLA simulator.

projects.name: PowerMeter
projects.shortDescription: An addon program for the game Golf It! to add additional control options.
projects.longDescription: An addon program for the game Golf It! to add additional control options. Improves game accessibility and ease-of-use.
